What would be the design of the school’s curriculum?
The design of the school’s curriculum that Albert Einstein wants based on the story “On Education (1936)”, no student would be required to study the same topics. Instead of making a student feel unintelligent because he was unable to comprehend the topic being taught by their teachers, we should encourage students to enhance their talents and creative thinking.
 What kind of facilities would this school have?
title: BLOG #1: Einstein-inspired School
